Virgo.Notes: Virgo, "The Virgin", is one of the constellations of the zodiac. Notable objects: M87 (a.k.a. Virgo A), the largest galaxy in the Virgo cluster & a major radio source, partially due to its jet; the Sombrero Galaxy (M104), an unbarred spiral galaxy; & the Eyes Galaxies (NGC 4435-NGC 4438, a.k.a. Arp 120), a pair of galaxies ~52 million light-years away.
